pages.text: Insanity is a gameplay mechanic added to Crystalline to balance out crystals. This way, you can not just go around obliterating things without some adverse side effects.

Insanity is separated into 7 stages:$(br)$(li)Stage 1: 10% to 29% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 2: 30% to 49% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 3: 50% to 69% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 4: 70% to 89% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 5: 90% to 99% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 6: 100% insanity$(br)$(li)Stage 7: Permanent insanity$(br2)Each stage comes with its own insanity events. Insanity events are events in the game that happen at intervals set in the mod config.
$(l)Levitation Event$()$(br)$(l)Stages:$() Stage 1, Stage 2$(br)$(l)Effects:$() Levitation I (2:30)$(br)$(l)Message:$() "You suddenly felt yourself levitating."

$(l)Dual Event$()$(br)$(l)Stages:$() Stage 3$(br)$(l)Effects:$() Slowness I (2:30) $(l)OR$() Blindness I (2:30)$(br)$(l)Message:$() "You suddenly slowed down, and felt a weird ooze at your feet that didn't even exist." $(l)OR$() "You suddenly lost your vision."

$(l)Poison Event$()$(br)$(l)Stages:$() Stage 4, Stage 5, Stage 6, Stage 7$(br)$(l)Effects:$() Poison III (2:30)$(br)$(l)Message:$() "Your own thoughts have somehow poisoned yourself. You find a mysterious purple powder on the ground."$(br)$(l)Items Gained:$() $(l:essences/pure_rift_essence)Pure Rift Essence$(/l) (x8)
